name: 功能語法
comment: 上課教室在雲和街大樓二樓，地址為雲和街1號(位於雲和小火鍋斜對面、Cafe a la mode正對面)，從師大側門右轉看見Starbucks右轉進入巷子步行約2分鐘(130公尺)，右手邊就會看到雲和街大樓，亦可使用Google Maps APP查詢位置。請同學使用學生證感應，進出雲和街上課教室。
syllabus:
本課程著重在從語言功能及語意-語法互動的觀點來討論句法現象。這些觀點主要以著名的功能語法理論「角色指稱語法」（Role and Reference Grammar, RRG）為依據，並輔以其他功能語法學派的相關看法。語料的來源則以不同類型的語言為主，並適時融入漢語及南島語。以下為各週討論的主題：

Week 1: Introduction

Week 2: Syntactic Representation (1)

Week 3: Syntactic Representation (2)

Week 4: Lexical Representation (1)

Week 5: Lexical Representation (2)

Week 6: Semantic Roles

Week 7: Information Structure

Week 8: Grammatical Relations (1)

Week 9: Grammatical Relations (2)

Week 10: Linking in Simple Sentences (1)

Week 11: Linking in Simple Sentences (2)

Week 12: Structure of Complex Sentences (1)

Week 13: Structure of Complex Sentences (2)

Week 14: Interclausal Relations Hierarchy (1)

Week 15: Interclausal Relations Hierarchy (2)

Week 16: Applications of Functional Grammar to Other Fields

Week 17: Term Paper Presentation

Week 18: Paper-writing Week (No class meeting!)
